## soluci칩n


1. cargar

```{r}
library(haven)
enusc <- read_sav("data/base-de-datos---xvi-enusc-2019-(sav).sav")
```

2. dimensiones

```{r}
dim(enusc)
```

3. Transformaci칩n

```{r}
library(dplyr)
enusc_2 <- enusc %>% filter(Kish==1) %>%
  select(enc_region, VA_DC, A1_1_1, B1_1_1, C1_1_1, D1_1_1,
         E1_1_1, G1_1_1, H1_1_1) %>%
  rename(region = enc_region, intimidacion = A1_1_1, 
         sorpresa = B1_1_1, fuerza_viv = C1_1_1,
         hurto = D1_1_1, lesiones = E1_1_1, 
         de_vehiculo = G1_1_1, desde_vehiculo= H1_1_1)

```

3.1 Alternativa de transformaci칩n m치s resumida

```{r}
library(dplyr)
enusc_2 <- enusc %>% filter(Kish==1) %>%
  select(region = enc_region, 
         VA_DC, 
         intimidacion = A1_1_1,
         sorpresa = B1_1_1,
         fuerza_viv = C1_1_1,
         hurto = D1_1_1,
         lesiones =  E1_1_1,
         de_vehiculo = G1_1_1,
         desde_vehiculo= H1_1_1, 
         Fact_Hog)
```


4. nuevas dimensiones

```{r}
dim(enusc_2)
```
5. dicotomizar variables

```{r}
enusc_2 <- enusc_2 %>% 
  mutate(intimidacion = ifelse(intimidacion==1,1,0), 
         sorpresa = ifelse(sorpresa==1,1,0), 
         fuerza_viv = ifelse(fuerza_viv==1,1,0),
         hurto = ifelse(hurto==1,1,0), 
         lesiones = ifelse(lesiones==1,1,0),
         de_vehiculo = ifelse(de_vehiculo==1,1,0),
         desde_vehiculo = ifelse(desde_vehiculo==1,1,0))
```

calcular `VA_DC_2`. 

```{r}
enusc_2 <- enusc_2 %>% mutate(suma = rowSums(enusc_2[3:9],
                                             na.rm = TRUE))
enusc_2 <- enusc_2 %>% mutate(VA_DC_2 = if_else(suma>=1, 1, 0))
```

6. 쯉in iguales?

```{r}
sum(enusc_2$VA_DC!=enusc_2$VA_DC_2)
```


7. tabular victimizaci칩n por regi칩n sin expandir
```{r}
enusc_2 %>% group_by(region) %>% 
  summarise(vic_hog = mean(VA_DC_2))
```


8. BONUS: tabulado con factor de expansi칩n.

```{r}
library(dplyr)

enusc_2 %>% summarise(vict = weighted.mean(VA_DC_2, Fact_Hog))

enusc_2 %>% group_by(region) %>% 
  summarise(vict = weighted.mean(VA_DC_2, Fact_Hog))


```
